text: Edgardo Norberto Andrada, better known as Edgardo Andrada, or simply Andrada (January 2, 1939 - September 4, 2019) was an Argentine professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for several top level Argentine and Brazilian clubs. He played for the Rosario Central, Vasco and the national team. Andrada was born in Rosario, Santa Fe province. Andrada died on September 4, 2019 in Rosario at the age of 80.Morre Andrada, goleiro que levou o milésimo gol de Pelé ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Edgardo Andrada
